title: Chemical compound

properties.name: description
properties.value: Chemical compound is a quest item used in The Dig Site quest to blow up bricks blocking the path below digsite. It is used with bricks and is lit with a tinderbox. It is made by combining nitroglycerin, ammonium nitrate, ground charcoal and arcenia root. Creating the compound requires Herblore level 10 and provides a total of 7.5 Herblore xp.

Chemical compound is a quest item used in The Dig Site quest to blow up bricks blocking the path below digsite. It is used with bricks and is lit with a tinderbox. It is made by combining nitroglycerin, ammonium nitrate, ground charcoal and arcenia root. Creating the compound requires Herblore level 10 and provides a total of 7.5 Herblore xp.

Warning! You take a large amount of damage if you drop the vial!

You will take a 65 damage down to a minimum of 1hp. Dropping the vial will never kill you. If you are on 1 hp and drop the vial your player will shout "Ow! That really hurt!" but a "0" hitsplat will appear.

[[File:Chemical compound detail.png|left|130x200px]]
'''Chemical compound''' is a [[quest]] item used in [[The Dig Site]] quest to blow up bricks blocking the path below [[digsite]]. It is used with bricks and is lit with a [[tinderbox]]. It is made by combining [[nitroglycerin]], [[ammonium nitrate]], [[ground charcoal]] and [[arcenia root]]. Creating the compound requires [[Herblore]] level 10 and provides a total of 7.5 Herblore xp.

'''Warning! You take a large amount of damage if you drop the vial! '''

You will take a 65 damage down to a minimum of 1hp. Dropping the vial '''will never kill you. '''If you are on 1 hp and drop the vial your player will shout "Ow! That really hurt!" but a "0" hitsplat will appear.
